name: CreateInterestGroup
description:
Create a new interest group for a specific category.

This tool is used to create a new interest or 'group name' within a specific interest category for a Mailchimp list. Use it when you need to organize and segment your list subscribers into specific interest groups.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Mailchimp list to which the interest group will be added.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: interest_category_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the interest category to which the new group belongs.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the interest category.

parameters.name: interest_group_name
parameters.description: The name of the interest group, shown publicly on subscription forms.

value_schema.description: The name of the interest. This can be shown publicly on a subscription form.

parameters.name: interest_display_order
parameters.description: The order in which this interest is displayed relative to others. Use an integer value.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: interest_category_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the interest category.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the interest category.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the interest. This can be shown publicly on a subscription form.

value_schema.description: The name of the interest. This can be shown publicly on a subscription form.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
